content: pokéball granny square stitches used in this pattern us terms magic_ring chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet tc- treble_crochet notes to make things a bit easier later on go ahead and crochet your ends in as you go for every color change in the pokéball except the first white to black i finished my last stitch in one color by picking up a loop of the new color so half way through the double_crochet if that makes sense i also found it easier to carry my black yarn through the entire row chain 3 always counts as a stitch i ll upload a version with pictures when i have a bit more time and make edits to this as people make suggestions this is my first time writing a pattern warning your pokéball will be exactly one stitch askew i didn t think it was noticeable so i didn t bother to redo the pattern if someone would like to do the quick math to fix it go for it start row 1- with white yarn make a magic_ring and double_crochet 12 into magic_ring pull tight on the original end to close the magic_ring 12 stitches row 2- change to black yarn 2sc in every double_crochet 24 stitches row 3- chain 3 this will count as your first stitch and double_crochet into that same stitch then change color to white as you finish the black double_crochet 1dc in the next stitch then 2dc in the following stitch repeat until you have 16 white dcs pick up your black yarn as you finish that last white double_crochet and 2dc black in the same stitch switch to red 1dc in the next stitch 2dc in the following stitch repeat until you have 16 red dcs pick up a loop in black yarn to finish the last double_crochet join 36 stitches row 4- chain 3 double_crochet in the following stitch switch to white and 2dc 1 double_crochet 1dc 2dc 1dc 1dc etc until you have 22 white stitches switch back to black 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet switch to red 2dc 1 double_crochet 1dc 2dc etc until you have 22 red stitches pick up a loop in black yarn to finish the last double_crochet join 48 stitches row 5- pick up green yarn at this point you can cut the black yarn and weave it in chain 3 1dc in next 6 stitches in the next stitch 2tc+ch2+2tc this will be your corner 1dc in next 11 stitches repeat this pattern corner+dcs all the way around joining at the end 60 stitches 15 on each side of the square row 6- chain 3 1dc in the next 8 stitches in the next stitch 2tc+ch2+2tc this will be your corner 1dc in next 15 stitches repeat this pattern corner+dcs all the way around joining at the end 76 stitches 19 on each side of the square row 7- pick up white yarn chain 3 1dc in the next 10 stitches in the next stitch 2tc+ch2+2tc
